sources.title: Follow A Star
sources.description: Norman Truscott is a store worker who dreams of stardom. Vernon Carew is a singer who's star is fading. Vernon manages to get a recording of Norman singing and passes it off as himself.

metadata.Plot: Norman Truscott is a store worker who dreams of stardom. Vernon Carew is a singer who's star is fading. Vernon manages to get a recording of Norman singing and passes it off as himself.
metadata.Writer: Jack Davies, Henry Blyth, Norman Wisdom
metadata.Actors: Norman Wisdom, June Laverick, Jerry Desmonde
